metadata.title: Word Assassins - A Social Deduction Game
metadata.description: Word Assassins is a social deduction game where players use secret words to eliminate each other. Perfect for friends, parties, and social gatherings.

home.title: Word Assassins
home.subtitle: The ultimate social deduction game that combines stealth, strategy, and vocabulary. Eliminate your targets, stay alive, and become the last assassin standing.
home.joinGameDescription: Create or join a game with your friends. Each player gets a secret word and target.
home.huntTargetDescription: Trick your target into saying their secret word. Be sneaky - it could take days!
home.stayAliveDescription: Watch what you say - someone's trying to make you say your secret word!
home.howToPlaySubtitle: A simple game of deception, strategy, and careful conversation

gameInstructions.setupDescription: Create a game and share the join code with your friends. Everyone needs to join before the game starts.
gameInstructions.assignmentDescription: Each player receives a secret word to protect and a target player to eliminate.
gameInstructions.gameplayDescription: Work your secret word into conversation naturally with your target. If they say it, they're eliminated!
gameInstructions.defenseDescription: Be careful what you say - someone is trying to make you say your secret word!
gameInstructions.winningDescription: When someone says their word, mark them as eliminated. The last player standing wins!
tipsDescription: • Be patient - rushing makes you suspicious
• Misdirect - talk about topics related to your word
• Stay alert - anyone could be your assassin

libGameInstructions.gettingStartedDescription: One player creates a game and shares the invite code. Once everyone's in, the creator hits "Start" and each player gets a secret word and target player.
libGameInstructions.makingAKillDescription: Get your target to say their secret word in conversation. They'll mark themselves as dead, and you'll get their target as your next mission.
libGameInstructions.stayingAliveDescription: Be careful with your words - someone is trying to make you say your secret word! When eliminated, you must mark yourself as killed.
libGameInstructions.fairPlayDescription: You can lie about your word and target, but never lie about eliminations. You can say your target's word, and get help from other players too.
libGameInstructions.winningLibDescription: Keep assassinating targets until you're the last one standing. The final survivor wins the game!
